alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 11:43AM EDT until March 15 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Fairfield County. In New Jersey, Western Bergen County. In New York, Rockland and Northern Westchester Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevations above 500 ft will have accumulations closer to 5 and 7 inches. This is where power outages are possible due to heavy wet snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
